trans-unit.source: Screen sizes and break points for responsive design
trans-unit.target: Screen sizes and break points for responsive design

trans-unit.source: The number of device targets and screen sizes across the Windows 10 ecosystem is too great to worry about optimizing your UI for each one.
trans-unit.target: The number of device targets and screen sizes across the Windows 10 ecosystem is too great to worry about optimizing your UI for each one.

trans-unit.source: Screen sizes and break points for responsive design
trans-unit.target: Screen sizes and break points for responsive design

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: The number of device targets and screen sizes across the Windows 10 ecosystem is too great to worry about optimizing your UI for each one.
trans-unit.target: The number of device targets and screen sizes across the Windows 10 ecosystem is too great to worry about optimizing your UI for each one.

trans-unit.source: Instead, we recommended designing for a few key widths (also called "breakpoints"): 320, 720, and 1024 epx.
trans-unit.target: Instead, we recommended designing for a few key widths (also called "breakpoints"): 320, 720, and 1024 epx.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** When designing for specific breakpoints, design for the amount of screen space available to your app (the app's window).
trans-unit.target: **Tip** When designing for specific breakpoints, design for the amount of screen space available to your app (the app's window).

trans-unit.source: When the app is running full-screen, the app window is the same size of the screen, but in other cases, it's smaller.
trans-unit.target: When the app is running full-screen, the app window is the same size of the screen, but in other cases, it's smaller.

trans-unit.source: This table describes the different size classes and provides general recommendations for tailoring for those size classes.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the different size classes and provides general recommendations for tailoring for those size classes.

trans-unit.source: You can make navigation and interactions easier on hand-held devices by placing navigation and command elements at the bottom of the screen so that users can easily reach them with their thumbs.
trans-unit.target: You can make navigation and interactions easier on hand-held devices by placing navigation and command elements at the bottom of the screen so that users can easily reach them with their thumbs.

trans-unit.source: Set left and right window margins to 12 px to create a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.
trans-unit.target: Set left and right window margins to 12 px to create a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.

trans-unit.source: Use an icon to represent search (don't show a search box).
trans-unit.target: Use an icon to represent search (don't show a search box).

trans-unit.source: Put the navigation pane in overlay mode to conserve screen space.
trans-unit.target: Put the navigation pane in overlay mode to conserve screen space.

trans-unit.source: If you're using the master detail element, use the stacked presentation mode to save screen space.
trans-unit.target: If you're using the master detail element, use the stacked presentation mode to save screen space.

trans-unit.source: With Continuum for Phones, a new experience for compatible Windows 10 mobile devices, users can connect their phones to a monitor and even use a mouse and keyboard to make their phones work like a laptop.
trans-unit.target: With Continuum for Phones, a new experience for compatible Windows 10 mobile devices, users can connect their phones to a monitor and even use a mouse and keyboard to make their phones work like a laptop.

trans-unit.source: (For more info, see the [Continuum for Phone article](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=699431).)
trans-unit.target: (For more info, see the [Continuum for Phone article](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=699431).)

trans-unit.source: Set left and right window margins to 24 px.
trans-unit.target: Set left and right window margins to 24 px.

trans-unit.source: We recommend creating a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.
trans-unit.target: We recommend creating a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.

trans-unit.source: Put the navigation pane into docked mode so that it always shows.
trans-unit.target: Put the navigation pane into docked mode so that it always shows.

trans-unit.source: Put navigation and command elements at the top of the app window.
trans-unit.target: Put navigation and command elements at the top of the app window.

trans-unit.source: Set left and right window margins to 24 px.
trans-unit.target: Set left and right window margins to 24 px.

trans-unit.source: We recommend creating a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.
trans-unit.target: We recommend creating a visual separation between the left and right edges of the app window.

trans-unit.source: Put the navigation pane into docked mode so that it always shows.
trans-unit.target: Put the navigation pane into docked mode so that it always shows.
